page.title: 06Going to Church S.Carse
page.content: St Mary the Virgin CE Church is in Amb- rosden, the Vicar is Father Richard. Donna & I are in the Choir & wear white & purple robes.When the first hymn has finished we have a Bible story then we kneel on the cushion & say a prayer. After that they collect money & we sing another hymn.Then we go up & Father Richard says "The blessing of Christ" & the adults get bread & wine, then we go back to our places.After church we have a drink & a biscuit & then we go to Sun day School. We have a story & we haveto do a picture from it.When we finish we go to the bell room & watch the bell- ringers.After that we sing a hymn, then we have a drink of orange & a biscuit. 2 Missioners Club is on every day except weekends.We read the Bible & sing songs Uncle Alf,our bible teacher reads us stories.Before we go home we have a game of rounders.(2:E.Frodsham).
